item.title: Epstein files: Reps ask judge to appoint monitor to ensure all documents released
item.description: "The Department of Justice is openly defying the law by refusing to release the full Epstein files," California Democratic Rep. Ro Khanna said

item.title: First vetoes of Trump's term survive override vote in Congress
item.description: The vote comes after the Senate voted to block Trump from further military action in Venezuela earlier in the day.

item.title: Supreme Court tariff decision: U.S. Customs has new deadline for companies seeking refunds
item.description: The window for U.S. importers to file for electronic refunds if the Supreme Court rules Trump's IEEPA tariffs are illegal is approaching.

item.title: Why Russia hasn't reacted to Trump's Greenland takeover bid
item.description: The Kremlin has not commented on Trump's Greenland ambitions, with analysts saying they serve a bigger purpose for Moscow.

item.title: ICE shooting: State officials say FBI is blocking evidence in Minneapolis investigation
item.description: Top federal officials have blamed Renee Nicole Good for being fatally shot by an ICE agent, despite the fact an investigation hasn't been completed.
